formatted text

Format a chunk of text with text formatting properties.

ftext(text, prop)

# S3 method for ftext
format(x, type = "console", ...)

# S3 method for ftext
dim(x)

Arguments

text
text value
prop
formatting text properties
x
ftext object
type
output format
...
unused

dim

Function dim returns width and height of the ftext when formatted.

Examples

ftext("hello", fp_text())
#> {text:{hello}}
#>
